roleset.name: discover a sickness
roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to diagnose.01. Diagnose.01 is member of vncls characterize-29.2. Framed by Katie.

example.name: What may seem like a tool can be the arg 0, as it tells you what the disease is
example.text: However, the cytology of the cells in the epidermis is nonetheless diagnostic.099
example.arg: the cytology of the cells in the epidermis
